name: Table
description: The Table component is used to display data in a table format.

props.name: onPageSizeChange
props.description: Callback for page size change events

props.name: onRowClick
props.description: Callback for click events on table row

props.name: onSelectionChange
props.description: Callback for click events on table row checkbox

props.name: onSortChange
props.description: Callback for sort events on table column headers

props.name: dataCy
props.description: Identifier for element selection in e2e testing

props.name: style
props.description: Custom styling applied to root element

props.name: actions
props.description: List of available actions (position can be: "icon" | "row" | "selection" | "toolbar")

props.name: actionsOrder
props.description: Order of actions to display (applies to positions: "icon" | "toolbar")

props.name: getRowStyle
props.description: Method to customize table row style

props.name: height
props.description: Height of table component (useful when sticky)

props.name: selectionFilter
props.description: Method to allow pre-selection of rows

props.name: showFilters
props.description: Show filters row (does nothing if there's no column with `renderFilter` defined)

props.name: stickySelection
props.description: Flag to enable sticky mode on selection checkbox

examples.name: data-actions
examples.code:
<Table
  actions={[
    {
      callback: () => {},
      icon: 'add',
      label: 'Add'
    },
    {
      callback: () => {},
      icon: <React.Memo />,
      label: 'Custom'
    },
    {
      callback: () => {},
      disabled: true,
      icon: 'block',
      label: 'Send'
    },
    {
      badge: {
        color: 'secondary',
        overlap: 'circular',
        value: '1',
        variant: 'standard'
      },
      callback: () => {},
      icon: 'filter',
      label: 'Filter',
      position: 'icon',
      tooltip: '1 filter applied'
    },
    {
      callback: () => {},
      icon: 'close',
      label: 'Close',

name: Select
description: The Select component is used to select an option from a list of options.

props.name: onInputChange
props.description: Callback for change event on input field

props.name: onScrollEnd
props.description: Callback for scrollEnd event on options list

props.name: autoSort
props.description: Automatically sorts options in alphabetical order (localeCompare)

props.name: customOptionRendering
props.description: Method to allow custom rendering of each option

props.name: getGroupLabel
props.description: Method to determine group label from group name

props.name: getOptionLabel
props.description: Method to extract option label from option

props.name: getOptionSelected
props.description: Method to determine currently selected option

props.name: groupBy
props.description: Method to group options using one option property

props.name: dataCy
props.description: Identifier for element selection in e2e testing

props.name: style
props.description: Custom styling applied to root element

props.name: autoFocus
props.description: Automatically get focus when the page loads

props.name: disabled
props.description: Adds disabled state and prevents interaction

name: SelectVirtualized
description: The SelectVirtualized component is used to select an option from a list of virtualized options.

props.name: onInputChange
props.description: Callback for change event on input field

props.name: onScrollEnd
props.description: Callback for scrollEnd event on options list

props.name: autoSort
props.description: Automatically sorts options in alphabetical order (localeCompare)

props.name: customOptionRendering
props.description: Method to allow custom rendering of each option

props.name: getGroupLabel
props.description: Method to determine group label from group name

props.name: getOptionLabel
props.description: Method to extract option label from option

props.name: getOptionSelected
props.description: Method to determine currently selected option

props.name: groupBy
props.description: Method to group options using one option property

props.name: dataCy
props.description: Identifier for element selection in e2e testing

props.name: style
props.description: Custom styling applied to root element

props.name: autoFocus
props.description: Automatically get focus when the page loads

props.name: disabled
props.description: Adds disabled state and prevents interaction

examples.name: primary
examples.code:
<SelectVirtualized
  label="Select"
  onChange={() => {}}
  options={[
    'Paintings',
    'Sculpture',
    'Mosaic',
    'Murales',
    'Photography'
  ]}
  placeholder="Select a value"
  virtualized
/>

name: InputNumber
description: The InputNumber is a number input component.

props.name: autoFocus
props.description: Automatically get focus when the page loads

props.name: disabled
props.description: Adds disabled state and prevents interaction

props.name: dataCy
props.description: Identifier for element selection in e2e testing

props.name: style
props.description: Custom styling applied to root element

examples.name: adornment
examples.code:
<InputNumber
  adornment={{
    icon: 'close'
  }}
  label="Label"
  maxValue={100}
  minValue={5}
  onChange={() => {}}
  value={5}
/>

name: AppBar
description: The AppBar is a surface that contains application navigation and other content.

props.name: dataCy
props.description: Identifier for element selection in e2e testing

props.name: style
props.description: Custom styling applied to root element

props.name: onTitleClick
props.description: Callback for click events on AppBar title

props.name: children
props.description: When specified it gets rendered as main content, has precedence over title

<AppBar

      icon: 'settings',
      onClick: () => {},
      tooltip: 'Settings'

    onClick: () => {},
    tooltip: 'Home'
  }}
  title="AppBar"
/>
